provider.name: singleplatform
provider.attributionText: Disclaimer: Always check with the business for pricing and availability of menu items. SinglePlatform is not responsible for menu or pricing changes, but the information is believed to be accurate when posted. Listing of a menu does not mean that there is any affiliation, endorsement or sponsorship between SinglePlatform and the listed business.

items.name: Bloody Mary

items.name: Pizza
items.description: In our fabulous 12 + inches pizza, we use only filtered water and superior Italian quality ingredients: farina 00, extra virgin olive oil, San Marzano peeled tomatoes, Sicilian sea salt, handmade mozzarella, buffalo mozzarella & burrata. Our pizza is also prepared in a specially constructed oven in order to ensure moisture free and crispy pizza dough.
